foreignData.name: Sigardas Vorhut
foreignData.text:
Aufblitzen
Fliegend
Immer wenn Sigardas Vorhut ins Spiel kommt oder angreift, bestimme eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturen mit unterschiedlicher Stärke. Die bestimmten Kreaturen erhalten Doppelschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Vanguardia de Sigarda
foreignData.text:
Destello.
Vuela.
Siempre que la Vanguardia de Sigarda entre al campo de batalla o ataque, elige cualquier cantidad de criaturas con fuerzas distintas. Esas criaturas ganan la habilidad de dañar dos veces hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Avant-garde de Sigarda
foreignData.text:
Flash
Vol
À chaque fois que l'Avant-garde de Sigarda arrive sur le champ de bataille ou attaque, choisissez n'importe quel nombre de créatures avec des forces différentes. Ces créatures acquièrent la double initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.name: Avanguardia di Sigarda
foreignData.text:
Lampo
Volare
Ogniqualvolta l'Avanguardia di Sigarda entra nel campo di battaglia o attacca, scegli un qualsiasi numero di creature con forza diversa. Quelle creature hanno doppio attacco fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: シガルダの先兵
foreignData.text:
瞬速
飛行
シガルダの先兵が戦場に出るか攻撃するたび、望む数のクリーチャーをパワーが異なるように選ぶ。ターン終了時まで、それらのクリーチャーは二段攻撃を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 天使

name: Sigarda's Vanguard
originalText:
Flash
Flying
Whenever Sigarda's Vanguard enters the battlefield or attacks, choose any number of creatures with different powers. Those creatures gain double strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: A set of creatures has different powers if every creature's power is a different value. For example, a 1/1 creature, a 2/1 creature, and a 3/1 creature all have different powers.

No creatures are targeted by Sigarda's Vanguard's ability. The set of creatures is chosen as the ability resolves. You may choose a single creature as a valid set. If you do, that creature will gain double strike until end of turn.

text:
Flash
Flying
Whenever Sigarda's Vanguard enters the battlefield or attacks, choose any number of creatures with different powers. Those creatures gain double strike until end of turn.
